pause_on_start.title: Pause On Start
pause_on_start.description: default <boolean=false>, If true the slot will be started in a paused state. It allows you configure before starting folding

passkey.title: PASSKEY
passkey.description: Your passkey or create one here : https://apps.foldingathome.org/getpasskey

cause.title: CAUSE
cause.description: The cause you prefer to support.

cpus.title: CPUS
cpus.description: How many CPUs a slot should use. <= 0 will use all the CPUs detected in the system.

cpu-usage.title: CPU USAGE
cpu-usage.description: The maximum percentage of the CPU a core should use. Not implemented by all cores.

gpu.title: GPU
gpu.description: gpu <boolean=true>. Enable or disable auto-confiugration of GPU slots, requires appropriate hardware.

smp.title: SMP
smp.description: <boolean=true>. Enable or disable auto-configuration of SMP slots, requires appropriate hardware.

allow.title: ALLOW
allow.description: <string=127.0.0.1> Client addresses which are allowed to connect to this server. This option  overrides IPs which are denied in the deny option. The pattern 0/0 matches all addresses.

command-allow-no-pass.title: COMMAND_ALLOW_NO_PASS
command-allow-no-pass.description: <string=127.0.0.1> IP address ranges that are allowed access to the command server with out a password if the 'password' option is set. These addresses will also have to be allowed IP based access.
